snippet: Attorney General Lisa Madigan asked the Chicago police on Wednesday to release a video that is said to show an officer shooting a black teenager 16 times last year.
abstract: Illinois Atty Gen Lisa Madigan asks Chicago police to release video that allegedly shows officer shooting black teenager Laquan McDonald 16 times in October 2014.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Lisa Madigan asked the Chicago police on Wednesday to release a video that is said to show an officer shooting a black teenager 16 times last year.

headline.main: Illinois: Attorney General Seeks Release of a Police Video
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Attorney General Seeks Release of a Police Video
